author: felixweber
title: Eastern Town Hall & Japan
description: The Japanese Community needs an fast and safe onboarding experience into Project Catalyst.
solution: The Eastern Town Hall creates a center of gravity for the japanese community. We provide a fast and safe "tailor made" onboarding structure
